profile_summary.name: Gnyan
profile_summary.weekly_progression_goal: Next week, consider adding a few more reps or sets to each exercise to increase intensity.

exercises.name: Marching in Place
exercises.benefit: Increases heart rate and prepares the body for exercise
exercises.safety_cue: Keep a steady pace and maintain balance.
steps: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.
March in place, lifting knees high.
Swing arms naturally at the sides.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.benefit: Improves shoulder mobility and warms up the upper body
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the movements controlled and avoid straining the shoulders.
steps: Stand tall with feet shoulder-width apart.
Extend arms out to the sides at shoulder height.
Make small circular movements with the arms, gradually increasing the size of the circles.

exercises.name: Leg Swings
exercises.benefit: Enhances hip mobility and prepares the lower body for exercise
exercises.safety_cue: Maintain balance and avoid swinging too high or too fast.
steps: Stand tall holding onto a stable chair or wall for support.
Swing one leg forward and backward in a controlled motion.
Keep the leg straight and swing from the hip, not the knee.

exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.benefit: Strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the body in a straight line and avoid arching the back.
steps: Start in a high plank position with hands shoulder-width apart.
Lower the body until the chest is close to the ground.
Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the knees behind the toes and maintain a neutral spine.
steps: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower the body as if sitting in a chair, keeping the weight in the heels.
Push through the heels to stand back up.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.benefit: Strengthens the core and improves stability
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the neck neutral and avoid straining the lower back.
steps: Lie face down with forearms on the ground and hands shoulder-width apart.
Push up onto the toes, keeping the body in a straight line.
Hold the position without letting the hips sag or pike up.

exercises.name: Lunge
exercises.benefit: Strengthens the legs and glutes, improves balance
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the front knee behind the toes and maintain an upright torso.
steps: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.
Step forward with one foot, lowering the body until the front knee is at a 90-degree angle.
Push through the front heel to return to the starting position.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the lower back pressed into the floor and avoid pulling on the neck.
steps: Lie on your back with hands behind the head and legs extended.
Bring the right knee towards the chest and twist the upper body to bring the left elbow towards the right knee.
Switch sides, bringing the left knee towards the chest and the right elbow towards the left knee.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the shoulders and head on the ground and avoid arching the back.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Engage the glutes and lift the hips until the body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees.
Lower the hips back down to the starting position.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.benefit: Stretches the back and hips, promotes relaxation
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the knees comfortable and avoid straining the lower back.
steps: Kneel on the floor with knees hip-width apart and feet together behind you.
Sit back on your heels and extend your arms in front of you.
Rest your forehead on the ground and hold the position.

exercises.name: Seated Forward Bend
exercises.benefit: Stretches the hamstrings and lower back
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the back straight and avoid rounding the spine.
steps: Sit on the floor with legs extended in front of you.
Reach forward towards your toes, keeping the back straight.
Hold the position, feeling a gentle stretch in the hamstrings.

exercises.name: Deep Belly Breathing
exercises.safety_cue: Keep the breath slow and controlled, avoiding any strain.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Place one hand on your chest and the other on your belly.
Inhale deeply through the nose, filling the lungs completely, and exhale slowly through the mouth.

safety_notes: Avoid any exercises that cause pain or discomfort in the joints.
Stay hydrated throughout the workout and listen to your body for any signs of fatigue.
Maintain proper form during each exercise to avoid injury and maximize benefits.
